must begin with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters.
Configure the Load Balancer with a simple health check and cookie-based stickiness

{u'Fn::Base64': {u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'#!/bin/bash -v
', u'yum update -y aws-cfn-bootstrap
', u'# Helper function
', u'function error_exit
', u'{
', u'  /opt/aws/bin/cfn-signal -e 1 -r "$1" '', {u'Ref': u'WaitHandle'}, u"'
", u'  exit 1
', u'}
', u'# Install Apache Web Server, MySQL and Drupal
', u'/opt/aws/bin/cfn-init -s ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackId'}, u' -r LaunchConfig ', u'    --region ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u" || error_exit 'Failed to run cfn-init'
", u'# Install s3fs
', u'cd /home/ec2-user/s3fs/s3fs-1.61
', u'./configure --prefix=/usr
', u'make
', u'make install
', u'# Move the website files to the top level
', u'mv /var/www/html/drupal-7.8/* /var/www/html
', u'mv /var/www/html/drupal-7.8/.htaccess /var/www/html
', u'rm -Rf /var/www/html/drupal-7.8
', u'# Mount the S3 bucket
', u'mv /var/www/html/sites/default/files /var/www/html/sites/default/files_original
', u'mkdir -p /var/www/html/sites/default/files
', u's3fs -o allow_other -o use_cache=/tmp ', {u'Ref': u'S3Bucket'}, u" /var/www/html/sites/default/files || error_exit 'Failed to mount the S3 bucket'
", u'echo `hostname` >> /var/www/html/sites/default/files/hosts
', u'# Make changes to Apache Web Server configuration
', u"sed -i 's/AllowOverride None/AllowOverride All/g'  /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf
", u'service httpd restart
', u"# Only execute the site install if we are the first host up - otherwise we'll end up losing all the data
", u'read first < /var/www/html/sites/default/files/hosts
', u'if [ `hostname` = $first ]
', u'then
', u'  # Create the site in Drupal
', u'  cd /var/www/html
', u'  ~ec2-user/drush/drush site-install standard --yes', u"     --site-name='", {u'Ref': u'SiteName'}, u"' --site-mail=", {u'Ref': u'SiteEMail'}, u'     --account-name=', {u'Ref': u'SiteAdmin'}, u' --account-pass=', {u'Ref': u'SitePassword'}, u'     --db-url=mysql://', {u'Ref': u'DBUsername'}, u':', {u'Ref': u'DBPassword'}, u'@', {u'Fn::GetAtt': [u'DBInstance', u'Endpoint.Address']}, u':', {u'Fn::GetAtt': [u'DBInstance', u'Endpoint.Port']}, u'/', {u'Ref': u'DBName'}, u'     --db-prefix=drupal_
', u'  # use the S3 bucket for shared file storage
', u'  cp -R sites/default/files_original/* sites/default/files
', u'  cp -R sites/default/files_original/.htaccess sites/default/files
', u'else
', u'  # Copy settings.php file since everything else is configured
', u'  cp /home/ec2-user/settings.php /var/www/html/sites/default
', u'fi
', u'# Update the code on all machines. 
', u'cd ~ec2-user 
', u'~ec2-user/drush/drush self-update --choice=2 --yes 
', u'cd /var/www/html 
', u'~ec2-user/drush/drush pm-updatecode --yes 
', u'# Update the database from the first machine only. 
', u'if [ `hostname` = $first ]
', u'then
', u'    ~ec2-user/drush/drush updatedb --yes 
', u'fi
', u'# Add modules. Many more are automatically added to this list. 
', u'# Files are copied to all machines. 
', u'~ec2-user/drush/drush pm-download acl commerce content_access entity rules support --yes 
', u'# Enable modules and rebuild the permissions table. The database holds this. 
', u'if [ `hostname` = $first ]
', u'then
', u'~ec2-user/drush/drush pm-enable  commerce content_access support --yes 
', u"~ec2-user/drush/drush php-eval 'node_access_rebuild();' 
", u'fi
', u'# Fix ownership and permissions. 
', u'chown -R root:apache /var/www/html 
', u'chmod 640 /var/www/html/sites/default/settings.php 
', u'# clean up 
', u'rm /home/ec2-user/settings.php
', u'# All is well so signal success
', u'/opt/aws/bin/cfn-signal -e 0 -r "Drupal setup complete" '', {u'Ref': u'WaitHandle'}, u"'
"]]}}
The initial number of WebServer instances
must begin with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters.
must be between 1 and 5 EC2 instances.
Enable HTTP access via port 80, locked down to requests from the load balancer only and SSH access
[{u'InstancePort': u'80', u'PolicyNames': [u'CookieBasedPolicy'], u'LoadBalancerPort': u'80', u'Protocol': u'HTTP'}]
The Drupal site admin account username
must be either true or false.
The name of the Drupal Site

{u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'<?php
', u'
', u'$databases = array (
', u"  'default' =>
", u'  array (
', u"    'default' =>
", u'    array (
', u"      'database' => '", {u'Ref': u'DBName'}, u"',
", u"      'username' => '", {u'Ref': u'DBUsername'}, u"',
", u"      'password' => '", {u'Ref': u'DBPassword'}, u"',
", u"      'host' => '", {u'Fn::GetAtt': [u'DBInstance', u'Endpoint.Address']}, u"',
", u"      'port' => '", {u'Fn::GetAtt': [u'DBInstance', u'Endpoint.Port']}, u"',
", u"      'driver' => 'mysql',
", u"      'prefix' => 'drupal_',
", u'    ),
', u'  ),
', u');
', u'
', u'$update_free_access = FALSE;
', u'
', u"$drupal_hash_salt = '0c3R8noNALe3shsioQr5hK1dMHdwRfikLoSfqn0_xpA';
", u'
', u"ini_set('session.gc_probability', 1);
", u"ini_set('session.gc_divisor', 100);
", u"ini_set('session.gc_maxlifetime', 200000);
", u"ini_set('session.cookie_lifetime', 2000000);
"]]}
